Class ProblemMarkerManager

java.lang.Object
  org.atl.eclipse.adt.ui.viewsupport.ProblemMarkerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener
public class ProblemMarkerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener

Author:
idrissi Listens to resource deltas and filters for marker changes of type IMarker.PROBLEM Viewers showing error ticks should register as listener to this type.
